formattedAddress: 1951 Park Ave, New York, NY 10037, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1951 Park Ave, New York, NY 10037, USA

originalText.text: Got a Gua Sha facial with extractions here. I’d get the facial again, but I don’t think extractions are for me (they hurt). The space is clean and cute. Definitely recommend checking rose quartz and gold out if you’re interested in skincare.

text.text: Got a Gua Sha facial with extractions here. I’d get the facial again, but I don’t think extractions are for me (they hurt). The space is clean and cute. Definitely recommend checking rose quartz and gold out if you’re interested in skincare.

originalText.text: I experienced the Total Relaxation Treatment for the first time and it was incredible! I went in with just the hopes of some relaxation and had no idea I'd get so much more. I was surprised at how deeply relaxed my mind & body got. The facial reflexology was amazing & really helped my sinuses. The entire experience was much more rewarding and important for my well being than I could've imagined. Sarah is a gem to work with. I highly recommend this & will be back for future services as well!

text.text: I experienced the Total Relaxation Treatment for the first time and it was incredible! I went in with just the hopes of some relaxation and had no idea I'd get so much more. I highly recommend this & will be back for future services as well!

originalText.text: I had an incredibly relaxing 60 minute Gua Sha facial. Sara is incredibly knowledgeable and gave me excellent tips and products to use to help my different skin conditions. Her professionalism and kindness made this a perfect self care session! Her treatments were very gentle, the use of cool quartz and jade massage rollers perfectly offset the warm towels and her excellent neck/shoulder massage.  I will definitely be returning!

text.text: I had an incredibly relaxing 60 minute Gua Sha facial. Sara is incredibly knowledgeable and gave me excellent tips and products to use to help my different skin conditions. Her professionalism and kindness made this a perfect self care session! Her treatments were very gentle, the use of cool quartz and jade massage rollers perfectly offset the warm towels and her excellent neck/shoulder massage.  I will definitely be returning!

originalText.text: I want to start by saying that I think Sarah is a true healer. Her total relaxation treatment is just what the holistic doctor ordered! I am week 3 post op from breast reduction surgery and today was my second treatment since my surgery. It's super easy to relax under her care and if you are open to the magical possibilities her treatment has to offer you are in for an effortless 60 minutes exploring the astral plane. She has helped me get back in touch with my body after the surgery left my mind and body in a stressfully disconnected. Hopefully this review encourages any disbelievers to give this healing practice a try.

originalText.text:
I had an incredible experience when I visited Sarah for a total relaxation treatment. She provides a comfortable and warm environment, and I loved all the products she used. She was very focused and in tune with my experience, and she explained what she was doing as she went along. I left feeling completely relaxed and at peace, but also deeply moved.

Sarah is very friendly and always open to feedback. She is clearly an expert at what she does, and I highly recommend her to anyone looking for profound yet comfortable experience.
